channel.title: Need help changing NPC(shops) coords
channel.description: i need help changing where my shops stand as there in varrock and i want them in edgevillage if you tell me where to change(which file) ,i can change them myself thanks. done thanks!!!! pkforlol3

item.title: Need help changing NPC(shops) coords
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

the 10 is the HP

10 isnt hp, hp is editted in the npc.cfg file, not autospawn

Read full topic

item.title: Need help changing NPC(shops) coords
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

u must use the autospawn.cfg

I got this for aubury in varrock:

spawn = 553	3253	3402	0	3255	3404	3250	3399	1	10	Varrock Aubury at Magic shop

the 553 is the id of the npc, X=3253 and Y=3402, 0 is nothing…so jsut leave that 0, the rest is the movement, and the 10 is the HP, you can leave the movement the same as the Y and X coords, the X and Y coords (for example) of yanille wizard is:

2591 3086

so if u want to let the npc stand somewhere else, just change the coords, for example let aubury spawn at yan wizard tower:

spawn = 553 2591 3086 0 2591 3086 2591 3086 1 10 Varrock Aubury at Magic shop

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2007, 12:39:27 PM[/size][hr]and thats all…

Read full topic
